QuestData.Title: Seeking the Scout
QuestData.Description: We are still trying to locate all of our scouts out in the field. One of these, Altauur, enjoys handling the more dangerous missions.$b$bHe has not checked in and I feel we should check to make sure he has not taken on more than he can handle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Altauur at Dionor's Demise in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: D'kaan worried about me? He is more worried I will be chased back to the camp with one of those giant beasts in tow. Still I could use your help here...
